about_the_game:
Play as Ana and team up with companions to plant crops, click to collect resources, place various items, and enjoy a relaxing adventure in a magical and mysterious dream world.

Story

Another peaceful night, the moon hung high, and its gentle light watched over everyone as they drifted off to sleep. To the melody of a music box, Ana had a dream.

In that place, the sky stretched both above and below. Broken stones and ruins drifted in a kaleidoscope of light, lost in the glow, while the floating clouds beneath them extended like land, carrying endless wonders. To find her scattered companions in the dream, Ana and Ura planted seeds, drawing strength from the crops to venture deeper into the heart of the dream...

Feature

  • Distinctive characters and their little stories!

  • Simple planting and idle gameplay

    Plant seeds, wait for crops to grow, and click to gather spiritual power.

  • Unlock and place various items

    Collect and arrange unique items to automate harvesting and resource collection, speeding up spiritual power generation.

  • Expand your exploration and gradually unlock adorable interactions between characters in the story!

In this demo, you'll be able to；

  • Unlock three different crops

  • Five distinct items with special ability

  • The stories among the five featured characters

  • Enjoy a total of nine story illustrations, including the opening scenes
detailed_description:
Disclaimer

This demo features an auto-save function, but your progress won’t carry over to the full version of the game.


About the Demo

Play as Ana and team up with companions to plant crops, click to collect resources, place various items, and enjoy a relaxing adventure in a magical and mysterious dream world.

Story

Another peaceful night, the moon hung high, and its gentle light watched over everyone as they drifted off to sleep. To the melody of a music box, Ana had a dream.

In that place, the sky stretched both above and below. Broken stones and ruins drifted in a kaleidoscope of light, lost in the glow, while the floating clouds beneath them extended like land, carrying endless wonders. To find her scattered companions in the dream, Ana and Ura planted seeds, drawing strength from the crops to venture deeper into the heart of the dream...

Feature

  • Distinctive characters and their little stories!

  • Simple planting and idle gameplay

    Plant seeds, wait for crops to grow, and click to gather spiritual power.

  • Unlock and place various items

    Collect and arrange unique items to automate harvesting and resource collection, speeding up spiritual power generation.

  • Expand your exploration and gradually unlock adorable interactions between characters in the story!

In this demo, you'll be able to；

  • Unlock three different crops

  • Five distinct items with special ability

  • The stories among the five featured characters

  • Enjoy a total of nine story illustrations, including the opening scenes
name: Ana's Farm Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Ana’s farm is a peaceful idle game. With more and more crops and props on the field, you can unlock new picture book content step by step. Start your venture in this fantasy space with your adorable companions!
